comment:

comment: Very sweet girl and always had a smile on her face. Since our rooms are closed, I constantly pay attention to you when you sing, and even if you sing in Telugu, I really enjoy your singing. Keep going. All the best for your future !

comment: Manchi hardworker nuvvu... anni situations lo calm ga vuntav and finally All the best for your future

comment: Dear Suppu, thanks for being all the way with me. I would never forget all the moments we spent together in this campus. They r really special to me. .I really always get amused by your gudness. I have no doubt that your goodness continue to lead u to incredible places. Love you & Miss you Suppu :)
